abstract: Jon Pareles reviews performances at Global Citizen 2015 Festival, event promoting United Nations sustainable development goals, on Central Park's Great Lawn.
lead_paragraph: Global Citizen works with governments and nongovernmental organizations toward the 17 “Sustainable Development Goals” just adopted by the United Nations.

headline.main: Review: Global Citizen Festival, Including Beyoncé and Pearl Jam, Mixes Music and Activism
headline.print_headline: A Variety of Voices Interpret a Collective Message

snippet: Global Citizen works with governments and nongovernmental organizations toward the 17 “Sustainable Development Goals” just adopted by the United Nations.
